entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow this morning and early this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023
